Rulings.Tengu:
●If you send a monster to the GY for “Option Hunter” that has undetermined ATK, you gain 0 Life Points. (“King of the Skull Servants”, “Megarock Dragon”, “Maju Garzett”, etc.)
●“Option Hunter” does not target.
